## setSyncData() function

Sets data for SyncDataLoader

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setSyncData(data: any[], force?: boolean): GridAction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | <code>any[]</code> | data that should be replaced |
|  force | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that data should be reloaded |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GridAction`
